channel.title: CVE Feed for Ignazio Scimone -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-22301|2024-01-24T12:02:17.801Z -- Ignazio Scimone -- Albo Pretorio On line
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Ignazio Scimone Albo Pretorio On line.This issue affects Albo Pretorio On line: from n/a through 4.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-22302|2024-01-31T16:55:52.432Z -- Ignazio Scimone -- Albo Pretorio On line
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ignazio Scimone Albo Pretorio On line allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Albo Pretorio On line: from n/a through 4.6.6.
